title: Can someone help me get out of bronze please!
body:
Hey guys I need help to get out of bronze!

Add me on Perpetual7 if you can help me thanks!

replies.body:
Help you out of bronze.

step 1 sort out your rune pages they are putting you at a disadvantage to begin with.
step 2 follow some of what wicam has said

http://www.goldper10.com/guide/2400.html
main a role, play less champions, know all roles, record your games and look for your mistakes, not your team mates. improve on them one at a time.
e.g. csing, it was recommended to me that you should have 30cs at 5 minutes, 80 cs at 10 minutes, 170cs at 15 minutes. (around that, cant find the guide anymore).
watch streamers/YTubers who play the champs you play
